_comment: Example profiles showing different Google TTS model tiers. Copy this file to tts_profiles.json and customize.

chirp3._comment: Chirp3-HD: highest quality, most natural. Requires model field. $30/1M chars. Voices: Achernar, Achird, Algenib, Algieba, Alnilam, Aoede, Autonoe, Callirrhoe, Charon, Despina, Enceladus, Erinome, Fenrir, Gacrux, Iapetus, Kore, Laomedeia, Leda, Orus, Puck, Pulcherrima, Rasalgethi, Sadachbia, Sadaltager, Schedar, Sulafat, Umbriel, Vindemiatrix, Zephyr, Zubenelgenubi.

chirp._comment: Chirp-HD: older HD model, 3 voices only (D, F, O). Pricing not listed separately, likely $30/1M chars.

studio._comment: Studio: high quality, limited voice selection. No model field needed. $160/1M chars. Voices: O, Q.

casual._comment: Casual: conversational, relaxed tone. Priced as Neural2. $16/1M chars. Voices: K.

news._comment: News: optimized for news-reading style. Priced as Neural2. $16/1M chars. Voices: K, L, N.

polyglot._comment: Polyglot: multilingual voice, works across multiple languages. $16/1M chars. Voices: 1.

neural2._comment: Neural2: good quality, lower cost than Chirp3-HD and Studio. $16/1M chars. Voices: A, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J.

wavenet._comment: Wavenet: DeepMind WaveNet synthesis. $4/1M chars. Voices: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J.

standard._comment: Standard: basic quality, lowest cost. Good for high-volume use. $4/1M chars. Voices: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J.
